fields.text: Thank you for calling Formation in San Francisco, where we empower organizations with AI-driven, personalized customer journeys.
Press [INDEX] for Sales and product inquiries.
Press [INDEX] to schedule a personalized product demonstration.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for a product demonstration.
Press [INDEX] for pricing, quotes, and licensing information.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing specialist.
Press [INDEX] for Customer Support and service.
Press [INDEX] for technical support and troubleshooting.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.
Press [INDEX] for account management and billing inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to our accounts and billing team.
